entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 8:14 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:14 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the evening then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 8:14 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
